snippet: The government said Wednesday that it would seek to revoke the citizenship of the actress Maria Conchita Alonso, left, a fervent critic of its socialist-inspired policies.
abstract: Venezuelan government says it is seeking to revoke citizenship of actress Maria Conchita Alonso, fervent critic of its socialist-inspired policies; she was born in Cuba and moved to Venezuela as a child, becoming a naturalized citizen.
lead_paragraph: The government said Wednesday that it would seek to revoke the citizenship of the actress Maria Conchita Alonso, left, a fervent critic of its socialist-inspired policies.

headline.main: Venezuela: Move to Revoke Actress’s Citizenship
headline.print_headline: Venezuela: Move to Revoke Actress’s Citizenship
